original_text: I will make waste mountains and hills, and dry up all their herbs; and I will make the rivers islands, and I will dry up the pools.
korean_text: 내가 산들과 언덕들을 황폐하게 하며 그 모든 초목들을 마르게 하며 강들이 섬이 되게 하며 못들을 마르게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will make waste mountains and hills,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 산과 언덕을 황폐하게 만들 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and dry up all their herbs;
and I will make the rivers islands,
and I will dry up the pools.
